Jadi, kita para pendengar semakin terbatas. Seperti akses lirik sekarang harus premium, akses Queue yang semakin tidak jelas, kadang antrean selanjutnya malah yang ada di luar Playlist. Dan IKLAN semakin banyak. Itu saja yang membuat akhir-akhir ini saya rasa kurang nyaman untuk spotify. Hope next be better. :D

Mode Gratis & Premium: Versi gratis memiliki iklan, sedangkan versi premium menawarkan pengalaman tan

Spotify is an amazing music streaming app with a huge library of songs, podcasts, and playlists. The interface is smooth and easy to use, making it simple to discover new music. I love the personalized playlists like Discover Weekly and Daily Mix. Offline mode and high-quality audio are great, though some features require a premium subscription. Ads can be annoying in the free version, but overall, it’s a fantastic app for music lovers!
